title: Check up on what SkiaSharp is doing with resizing of images
body:
There are a fe issues talking about the quality and performance with image resizing:

 - https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/520
 - https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/319

We are working on a much later version of skia, so things may be better soon. But, just to keep track that this is an issue that exists.
